# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- First general instruction
- Second general instruction
- When a proposed fix doesn't resolve the issue, report 'it still have the same error' — investigate the current file and related components and provide a targeted code change.

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions

## Project-Specific Rules
- Frontend uses JavaScript (no TypeScript); prefer .jsx files and avoid TypeScript-specific files like custom.d.ts.
